choose-reaction: Choose a reaction video from the folder
choose-source: Choose a source video from the folder
choose-help: If you don't see a video inside the folder, it means the owner didn't enable the embedding for this video. Please inform the creator.
is-reaction-locale: Is your reaction video a local file?
is-source-locale: Is your source video a local file?
reaction-url-placeholder: Reaction Video URL (YouTube, Vimeo, Funimation, Iframe, Direct, DailyMotion)
source-url-placeholder: Source Video URL (YouTube, Vimeo, Funimation, Iframe, Direct, DailyMotion)
sync-play-pause: Do you want to sync play and pause?
